org.sakaiproject.component.app.help

Class HelpManagerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.dao.support.DaoSupport
      • org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
        • org.sakaiproject.component.app.help.HelpManagerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HelpManager, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

    public class HelpManagerImpl
extends org.springframework.orm.hibernate3.support.HibernateDaoSupport
implements HelpManager
    HelpManager provides database and search capabilitites for the Sakai help tool.
    Version:
    $Id: HelpManagerImpl.java 105079 2012-02-24 23:08:11Z ottenhoff@longsight.com $
    Author:
    Jarrod Lannan
